content: Hoho! I'm waiting for you, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>. With this <color=#8AAB4B>Get-Together Building Kit</color>, you can set up a place to dine with your friends.
Since <color=#8AAB4B>Mors'</color> arrival, he's been occupied with observing the local ecosystem and caring for the creatures.
When <color=#8AAB4B>Yunguo</color> moved over, she brought ingredients and recipes for everyone.

Eating together with the neighbors also <color=#8AAB4B>improves relationships</color>~ Please take these recipes that everyone helped come up with... As for how tasty they are, it depends on how well we cook today.
You've been busy all day, I think it's time for a rest. How about we take this opportunity to get together?
Once you have the dining area and ingredients ready, I'll contact everyone and we'll show up on time to cook with you. Then we can wrap up the day together, hoho...
